**cozy & customizable: the diamond granny stitch crochet hat**

*this pattern is included in the harvest hues collection*

introducing the diamond granny stitch crochet hat—a stylish and versatile accessory that’s perfect for the whole family! with six different sizes ranging from newborn to adult, this quick and easy project is ideal for adding a personalized touch to any outfit or creating heartfelt, handmade gifts.

**why you’ll love this hat:**

* **diamond granny stitch colorwork:** the hat features a beautiful diamond pattern created with the classic granny stitch, adding a touch of texture and elegance to this cozy accessory.

* **six sizes for all ages:** whether you’re making a tiny hat for a newborn or a stylish beanie for yourself, this pattern has you covered with six different sizes to ensure the perfect fit.

* **quick & satisfying project:** need a last-minute gift or a quick addition to your wardrobe? this hat works up quickly, making it a go-to project for busy makers.

* **customizable & versatile:** choose your favorite colors to match your style, or use it as a scrapbuster project to make the most of your yarn stash. the pattern is easy to customize, so you can create a unique hat for everyone on your list.

*  **perfect for gifting:** the diamond granny stitch crochet hat is a thoughtful and practical gift idea that’s perfect for any occasion. with its cozy warmth and stylish design, it’s sure to be a hit with recipients of all ages.

perfect for crocheters of all levels, this pattern comes with detailed instructions, including a full video tutorial to guide you through each step.

abbreviations
blo - back loop only
ch - chain
dc - double crochet
flo - front loop only
sl st - slip stitch
sc - single crochet
st(s) - stitch(es)
[stsc - stacked single crochet][15]




gauge:
15 sts x 9 rows = 4”x4” in granny stitch with 5.0mm hook
22 sts x 22 rows = 4”x4” in blo sc with 4.0mm hook


not sure what gauge is? check out this blog post: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][16]


sizes:
to fit head circumference: 
newborn: 13-14” (33-36 cm)
baby: 16-17” (41-43 cm)
toddler: 18-19” (46-48 cm)
child/small adult: 20-21” (51-53 cm)
adult: 22-23” (56-58 cm)
large adult: 24-25” (61-64 cm)


skill level:
intermediate
